front.title: Internet Printing Protocol/1.1: IPP Event Notification Change History

abstract.t: This document contains the change history for the development of the IPPNotification specification. The IPP Notification specification is anextension to the IPP/1.0 & IPP/1.1 model that allows clients tosubscribe to printing related events. Subscriptions include 'Per-JobSubmission subscriptions' and 'Per-Printer subscriptions'. Eithersubscription may specify job and/or printer events. This specificationhas been developed starting in the Fall of 1997.
